about_the_game:
Experience available up to stage 3.

Please note ⚠️! Keyboard not supported. ⚠️
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
The story is all done in cartoon style stills. There are about 600 stills.
Save the world by learning the boss's attack patterns through repeated retries.
The good BGM is also very good to listen to!
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

High difficulty bullet-hell 2D scrolling action game
Collect the cartoons and check out the story!

Witches, fairies and goddesses. Use the three main characters to conquer the game!
Two-person cooperative play offers more scope for strategy by making full use of powerful combined techniques!

game Stream Free
No storyline Is Allowed After the Last Boss.

There is a URL at the bottom of the page for a video with instructions on how to defeat the boss.

───────────────

Atry

X : Attack.　（Bullets stuck in the wall become footholds.
X (long Press) : Strong Attack[/h2]
A : Jump[/h2]
A (aerial) : 2-jumps[/h2]
Y : Special Technique[/h2]
(100 Guesses)[/h2]
↓+Y　　： Special Technique[/h2]
　　　　 (60 Guesses)[/h2]
　　　　　not Yet Mastered.[/h2]
B : ???[/h2]
　　　　　not Yet Time to Use[/h2]
L1 : Dash[/h2]
↓ : Crouching.
　　　　　　There may be scenes that require this action as well.
↓B : Going down a step.

───────────────

Fufa

Ｘ　　　　　　　：attack[/h2]
Ｘ（long Press）：strong Attack[/h2]
Ｘchargeｙ　　　：super Palm Attack[/h2]
Ａ　　　　　　　：flight[/h2]
Ｙ　　　　　　　：palm Attack[/h2]
Ｂ　　　　　　　：avoidance[/h2]
Ｌ１　　　　　　：seed Select[/h2]
Ｒ１　　　　　　：seed Select[/h2]
On the Ground↓ ：recovery Of Vitality[/h2]
↓ 　　　　: Crouching.
　　　　　　　　　There may be scenes that require this action as well.
↓B 　　　　 : Going down a step.
───────────────

Rohmia

X 　　 : Attack
X (long Press) : Strong Attack
X + ↑ 　 : Ice Attack
　　　　　　　distance Adjustable With Hold
X + ↓ 　 : fog Generation
X + ↓ (in Air) : Water Mass Attack
A 　　 : Jump
Y 　　 : Attack Up
B 　　 : All Recovery
　　 (only Once)
Leave 　　 : Water Recovery
L1 　　 : Guard
↓ 　　 : Crouching.
　　　　　　　There may be scenes that require this action as well.
↓B 　 : Going down a step.

───────────────

Please note ⚠️! Keyboard not supported. ⚠️
